com.ltsllc.miranda.miranda

Class Miranda

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.Subsystem
      • com.ltsllc.miranda.Consumer
        • com.ltsllc.miranda.miranda.Miranda
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparer, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Miranda
extends Consumer
    The Miranda system.

    This is also the main class for the system.

      • panic

        public void panic(Panic panic)
        Something Very Bad happend and part of the system wants to shutdown. Return true if we agree, which means shutting down the system and false if we want to try and keep going.
        Parameters:
        panic -
